# NOAA Paleoclimatology Program - Paleocean Site Data
# dsdp502_isot-tab.txt
# Isotope data only
# File Created: 19-Jan-2005
#
#*********************************************************************************
# Please cite the contributor and the original publications when using these data
#*********************************************************************************
#
# Missing Values indicated by '-999'
#
# PI:             Peter B. deMenocal
# Core/Site:      DSDP502
# Latitude:       11.00.00N	( 11)
# Longitude:      80.00.00W	( -80)
# Water Depth(m): 3051
#
# Publications:
#   deMenocal, P.B., D.W. Oppo, R.G. Fairbanks, and W.L. Prell. 1992. Pleistocene
#     d13C variability of North Atlantic intermediate water. Paleoceanography
#     7(2):229-250.
#------------------
#
# Description & Notes:
#   North Atlantic Intermediate water carbon isotopes during the Pleistocene.
#   Age correlated to the "TP607" time scale presented by Ruddiman et al. [1989].
#   Notes are core-hole-section followed by depth in section.
#
# Variables:
#             depth         Depth (cm)
#             yrBP          radiocarbon years B.P. (Libby half-life; B.P. = 1950)
#             d13Cforams-b  delta C13 PDB (Benthic Foraminifers)
#             d18Oforams-b  delta O18 PDB (Benthic Foraminifers)
#
# CORE: DSDP502
depth	yrBP 	d13Cforams-b	d18Oforams-b	notes
